SongLyrics.JpnStr: もうすぐ時計[とけい]は6時[じ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The clock will soon strike six.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もうそこに一番星[いちばんぼし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The first star is already there.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 影[かげ]を踏[ふ]んで 夜[よる]に紛[まぎ]れたくなる帰[かえ]り道[みち]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Stepping on shadows, I feel like slipping into the night on my way home.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どんなに探[さが]してみても
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how much I search,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一[ひと]つしかない星[ほし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's only one star.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何億[なんおく]光年[こうねん] 離[はな]れたところからあんなに輝[かがや]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: It shines so brightly from billions of light-years away.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いいな 君[きみ]は 皆[みんな]から愛[あい]されて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't it nice? You're loved by everyone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「いいや 僕[ぼく]は ずっと一人[ひとり]きりさ」
SongLyrics.EngStr: But no, I've always been alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になれたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could gather with you and become a constellation,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 星降[ほしふ]る夜[よる] 一瞬[いっしゅん]の願[ねが]い事[ごと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: A shooting star in the night, a fleeting wish.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: きらめいて ゆらめいて 震[ふる]えてるシグナル
SongLyrics.EngStr: It glimmers, sways, and the signal trembles.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になれたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could gather with you and become a constellation,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 空[そら]見上[みあ]げて 指[ゆび]を差[さ]されるような
SongLyrics.EngStr: So that when people look up at the sky, they'd point at us.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: つないだ線[せん] 解[ほど]かないで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't untie the lines we've connected.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]がどんなに眩[まぶ]しくても
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how dazzling I may become.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もうすぐ時計[とけい]は8時[じ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The clock will soon strike eight.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜空[よぞら]に満天[まんてん]の星[ほし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The night sky is filled with stars.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何億[なんおく]光年[こうねん] 離[はな]れたところにはもうないかもしれない
SongLyrics.EngStr: They might no longer exist billions of light-years away.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 月[つき]が綺麗[きれい]で 泣[な]きそうになるのは
SongLyrics.EngStr: The moon is so beautiful, it almost makes me cry.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつの日[ひ]にか 別[わか]れが来[く]るから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because someday, we will part.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になれたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could gather with you and become a constellation,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 彗星[すいせい]みたい 流[なが]れるひとりごと
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like a comet, my thoughts drift away.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 消[き]えていく 残像[ざんぞう]は 真夜中[まよなか]のプリズム
SongLyrics.EngStr: The fading afterimage is a prism in the middle of the night.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になれたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could gather with you and become a constellation,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 切[せつ]なる願[ねが]い 誰[だれ]かに届[とど]いたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If my earnest wish reaches someone,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[か]われるかな 夜[よる]の淵[ふち]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: Could I change, even at the edge of the night?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なぞるような こんな僕[ぼく]でも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even someone like me, tracing the edge.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遥[はる]か彼方[かなた] 僕[ぼく]らは出会[であ]ってしまった
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the distant horizon, we met.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: カルマだから 何度[なんど]も出会[であ]ってしまうよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's karma, so we will meet again and again.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 雲[くも]の隙間[すきま]で
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the gaps between the clouds.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になれたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could gather with you and become a constellation,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]広[ひろ]げて 描[えが]こう絵空事[えそらごと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's spread out the night and paint a fantasy.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 暗闇[くらやみ]を 照[て]らすような 満月[まんげつ]じゃなくても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if it's not a full moon that lights up the darkness,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だから集[あつ]まって星座[せいざ]になりたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's why I want to gather and become a constellation.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 色[いろ]とりどりの光[ひかり] 放[はな]つような
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like multicolored lights shining brightly.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: つないだ線[せん] 解[ほど]かないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I won't untie the lines we've connected.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]がどんなに眩[まぶ]しくても
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how dazzling you may become.

ListVocab: 色とりどり-いろとりどり
